p: The inclusion of condensed tannin extract in the young bullsâ€™ diets promoted a quadratic reduction in the lipid content ( P = 0.010), with the lowest inclusion level of 25.5 g/kg of DM obtained for 0.78 g/100 g of salted and sun-dried meat content ( Table 2). We found a linear increase in the water retention capacity ( P = 0.002) and cooking weight loss ( P = 0.025) and a linear reduction for the collagen ( P = 0.006) of the salted and sun-dried meat from young Nellore bulls.
